width--content.title: Fit content width
width--content.description: Sets the element width to fit its content.

width--20.title: 20% viewport width
width--20.description: Sets the element width to 20% of the viewport width.

width--25.description: Sets the element width to 25% of the viewport width.

width--100.description: Sets the element width to 100% of the viewport width.

width--full.description: Sets the element width to 100% of its parent container.
